name: Backrooms Horror Maze
description:
Get Backrooms Horror Maze on Play Store



BACKROOMS HORROR MAZE

Overcome countless mazes escaping from Backrooms Horror and improve your skills. Backrooms Horror Maze is a first-person horror puzzle game where the player's goal is to escape from the maze level alive, at a certain time. Every level is different, every game different, to escape from the maze the player should find a certain number of books to complete the mission. Every maze level has an enemy that secures the maze, and the player should avoid any contact with the enemy to avoid death. Backrooms Horror Maze is a spooky and scary game experience, with endless gameplay, and a random maze generator, every game is different, with different backroom levels against different enemy types.

Escape from the backrooms maze

Endless maze levels of the backrooms

Endless Gameplay with random maze generator

Countless maze levels and random maze generator

Immersive Graphics

Backrooms horror maze comes with immersive graphics with the best performance for mobile / PC

Move: wsad/zsdq

Crouch: left ctrl

Sprint: Shift

Jump: Space
